1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Vipul,
I apologize for the inconvenience. I will send you a calendar invite from outlook for us to speak then.
I look forward to speaking with you Thursday! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Vipul Vaishnav [mailto:vips.vaishnav@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, January 02, 2012 9:15 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
Hello Nicole,
I tried to set up an appointment with you for 10 a.m. (EST) on Thursday (1/5), but the confirmation screen gave me "unknown error".
Thanks.
-Vipul On Sat, Dec 31, 2011 at 8:27 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear Vipul,
Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Nicolette Taylor, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day.
If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK.
I look forward to speaking with you!
Best regards, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6281 f: 703.793.6070 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
